name: Shoot The Barrel - BING BANG BOOM
name_original: Shoot The Barrel - BING BANG BOOM
description:
Shoot the Barrel game. In this top down shooter you are the protagonist fighting against the barrels.

1. Shoot the incoming barrels in this runner shooter game
2. See how far you canget
3. As you survive the barrels become harder to destroy
4. Gather teammates and fight the barrels together
